body_html: Visual studio project/solution files can be very annoying, because propagation of configuration sometimes needs a lot of manual setting on the dropdowns by hand. I can't remember the project view on the top of my head. Can you try the www.dependencywalker.com tool on the pywrap DLL and see if there's anything missing from there?

body: Visual studio project/solution files can be very annoying, because propagation of configuration sometimes needs a lot of manual setting on the dropdowns by hand. I can't remember the project view on the top of my head. Can you try the www.dependencywalker.com tool on the pywrap DLL and see if there's anything missing from there?
